name: E-commerce Cards - Figma Freebie
description:
This beautiful collection of UI components is part of the recently released Purpose Design System. It is a powerful tool for Figma including ready to use components, pages, and styles designed to help you build modern user interfaces.


See the full version


We love to create, and most of all to share. This is why we want to transform these freebies into a beautiful series. Each week we will post a new design file for different purposes.


Stay in the loop! Check our website and our Dribbble account for updates.
